Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid padding method
        is specified.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, b'', b''
kwargs = {'padding_method': 'invalid', 'hashing_algorithm': enums.
    HashingAlgorithm.SHA_1}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "The padding method 'invalid' is not supported for asymmetric encryption.",
    engine.encrypt, *args, **kwargs)
